title: 5 Connectors to Sound More Fluid
snippet: Connectors. These are the words that really make the difference. Essentially, connectors are the “oil on the chain” that allow you to speak fluidly and smoothly. Do you want to sound more fluid? More coherent? More captivating? And above all, sound smooth?
